## Welcome

## ğŸ“‹ Course Description

This course introduces the fundamentals of online language questionnaires with an emphasis on hands-on practice. After discussing ethic issues in linguistic research, the course will be divided into three parts:

1.  **Fundamental concepts** and practices in language questionnaires.
2.  **Set-up of a web-based questionnaire** (using PCIbex).
3.  **Handling, analysis, and visualization** of the results (using R).

By the end of the course, students are expected to acquire the basic knowledge of questionnaire design concepts and the capacity to design and run their own language questionnaire.
